meta.title: From ANT to MAN
meta.author: Sandy Weisz
meta.message: Welcome to **RUDDLE**! This week we're rebranding as the only Paul Rudd-themed daily word game. Today's game is about Ant-Man, aka Scott Lang, aka Paul Rudd. Rudd has played Ant-Man in 5 Marvel movies so far. If you squint, you might be able to see him hiding out in the punctuation in one of the clues.

ladder.clue: Insert a letter into <> get a homophone of <> (depending on your dialect)
Insert a letter into <> to get some kind of mail
Reverse <> to get some things that help you get around
Add a letter to the end of <> (and insert a space) to get a famous R&B song
Performer who was known for singing "<>"
Take the first part of <>, attach an L, then reverse it for a drink
Popular chain where you can get a <>
